table.SQL_SELECT_LIST:
set nocount on declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from wcms_Site where { Site_Address <o> @Search:Site_Address and } { Site_AddressAlias <o> @Search:Site_AddressAlias and } 1 = 1 ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage
select [Site_ID] ,[Site_Name] ,[Site_Address] ,[Site_AddressAlias] ,(select Language_Name from wcms_Language where Language_ID = [Site_DefaultLanguage]) as [Site_DefaultLanguage] ,case when [Site_A] = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as [Site_A] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Site_ID] ,[Site_Name] ,[Site_Address] ,[Site_AddressAlias] ,[Site_DefaultLanguage] ,[Site_A] from wcms_Site where { Site_Address <o> @Search:Site_Address and } { Site_AddressAlias <o> @Search:Site_AddressAlias and } 1 = 1 ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
